name: BlenderTools
description: Blender addons that improve the game development workflow between Blender and Unreal.

scripts.build: npm install && rm -f -r dist && vuepress build main && vuepress build send2ue && vuepress build ue2rigify && cp -r ./main/.vuepress/dist ./dist && cp -r ./ue2rigify/.vuepress/dist ./dist/ue2rigify && cp -r ./send2ue/.vuepress/dist ./dist/send2ue
